thread.title: Run the Jewels Detail New Signature “Stay Gold” Beer
thread.title_full: Run the Jewels Detail New Signature “Stay Gold” Beer

author: Noah Yoo
title: Run the Jewels Detail New Signature “Stay Gold” Beer
text:
Run the Jewels Detail New Signature “Stay Gold” Beer Developed with former Def Jux manager Jesse Ferguson at Interboro Brewing Run the Jewels Photo by Tim Mosenfelder/Getty Images 
Earlier this month, Pitchfork announced that Run the Jewels had developed a new beer in partnership with Interboro Brewing, a brewery run by former Def Jux manager Jesse Ferguson. A North East style IPA named “Stay Gold” (titled after the RTJ3 track of the same name), the beer will be unveiled at the hip-hop duo’s first Terminal 5 show in New York City on February 25, as well as the October Kickoff Party in Charlotte, NC on March 14. ( October is a creation from Slow Focus, Pitchfork's creative studio.) Check out new images from the beer cans below, featuring RTJ’s logo, as well as a short clip behind the scenes of the making of “Stay Gold.” Artists In This Story
